page.title: About
page.content:
What I Use

Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, C#, T-SQL
Frameworks/Tooling: React, Webpack, Babel, Git, Gatsby, .NET Framework, .NET Core, SQL Server
Environments: Linux (Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora), Windows (WSL), macOS

Where I’ve Been

BizStream

    • Web Developer
      May 2021 – Present

      • Implemented website features and components per client specification using Gatsby and ReactJS, C# MVC and Razor, on top of Kentico Xperience and Kentico Content driven CMSs.

SalesPad, LLC.

    • Software Developer, Software Developer II
      September 2017 – April 2021

      • Contributed to the full stack development and maintenance of a TypeScript AngularJS SaaS ERP application with external accounting and fulfillment integrations in TypeScript, ReactJS, .NET Core and facilitated team development by mentoring new developers on frontend web development.
      • Used Jest, NUnit and xUnit Integration Testing and Unit Testing to confirm software reliability and prevent regressions.
      • Lead and mentored a frontend modernization of a server rendered AngularJS OAuth authentication service to a ReactJS frontend, working alongside product and UI designers to implement security and user experience best practices from InVision mockups.
      • Engaged in a legacy modernization project, updating a server rendered Java application to an AngularJS solution powered by .NET Framework and ASP.NET SignalR. Implemented integration to Google Maps for real time tracking of service assets.
      • Participated in an exploration project using ReactJS Piral micro-frontends to provide customization and tailoring of web applications and deployment of custom modules and functionality to an existing SaaS application.
    • Customs Developer August 2017 – September 2017
      • Developed enhancements and customizations for a web-based AngularJS B2B portal and desktop ERP application in .NET Framework following customer specifications and requirements.
      • Explored and integrated Commerce V3 eCommerce integration into SalesPad desktop ERP application.
    • Innovations Development Intern January 2017 – August 2017
      • Contributed software enhancements for a web-based B2B portal using AngularJS.
      • Collaborated with other interns in skills development and exploration into web scraping.
